headline: Palantir (PLTR): Evaluating Valuation After New AI Partnerships and the Launch of Chain Reaction Platform
summary: Palantir Technologies (PLTR) just stacked several high profile announcements, from its real time rodeo AI project with Teton Ridge and Nvidia to the new Chain Reaction infrastructure platform, reinforcing the stock’s evolving commercial growth story. See our latest analysis for Palantir Technologies. Those announcements are landing against a backdrop of strong momentum, with Palantir’s share price up sharply this year and a three year total shareholder return above 2,300 percent signaling how...
